main event: A UFO sighting reported involving brilliant white and orange lights observed at Hamilton AFB, California, on 15 July 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.,The lights appeared similar to jet exhaust.,The object was observed diving at a slight visual angle.,Reported by a reliable individual with 364 flying hours.,The conclusion suggested it could possibly be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: a very reliable and trustworthy individual with flying experience
